overview: Film director Masato Hara welcomes MAORI as a partner and begins a new life.  The two of us routinely turn the 8mm camera and make songs while the days go by.  The time between the two will soon be the time for the three with their newborn eldest son, KOBOH.  And a small family trip. Head south from Kyoto to Hiroshima, Kyushu, and Okinawa.  Put enough luggage, shooting equipment and accordion in a small car.
title: MI • TA • RI!
